item.title: Why Nosferatu Drinks Blood From His Victims' Chests Instead Of Their Necks
item.description: In Nosferatu, the titular demon sucks blood from his victimsâ€™ chest rather than their necks, and this change means way more than you might think.

item.title: Captain America: Brave New World's 70 Marvel Easter Eggs & References Explained
item.description: Captain America: Brave New World features a large collection of exciting Easter eggs, references to the greater MCU, and some great cameos.

item.title: Fast & Furious 11 Is Getting Rid Of The Franchise's Most Annoying Trope 10 Years After It Started
item.description: Dante Reyes' return as the villain in Fast & Furious 11 will avoid the most annoying trope the Fast & Furious franchise has used for the past decade.
